headline: A New Era of Customer-Centricity with IFF Pharma Solutions' AnswerCenter Platform
summary: IFF (NYSE:IFF) Pharma Solutions announces the launch of its new customer experience platform, AnswerCenter. This customized environment is designed to provide comprehensive support and an elevated user experience, underscoring IFF's commitment to customer-centricity and digital innovation. While personal customer relationships and connection points are imperative, the platform is another important offering, allowing customers to be in the driver's seat when they want to quickly access informatio
